onboarding.title: Welcome to Our App
onboarding.instructions: Please follow these steps to get started

import.title: Import Wallet
import.instructions: Please upload your wallet file obtained from the iawia mobile app

create.title: Download Our Mobile App
create.description: For enhanced security and unique features, wallet creation is only available through our mobile app. Please scan the QR code below or visit our mobile app store pages to download the app.
